summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to energy efficiency and energy conservation: amending Section 22.700.010 of the Seattle Municipal Code ("SMC") that adopted the 2000 Washington State Energy Code with Seattle amendments and amending the Energy Code Sections 1132.2, 1132.3, 1133, 1301, 1310.2, 1312.2, 1322, 1323, 1323.3, 1331, 1333, 1401, 1411.1, 1411.4, 1412.2, 1412.4, 1412.6, 1412.8, 1413, 1413.2, 1413.3, 1414.1, 1416, 1421.1, 1423, 1431.2, 1432.2, 1433, 1436, 1437, 1438, 1440, 1452, 1501, 1510, 1512, 1512.1, 1512.2, 1513.1, 1513.3, 1513.5, 1513.6, 1521, 1530, 1532, and Tables 10-5B, 10-6, 13-1, 14-4, and 15-1, and the title to Chapter 15; adding new Sections 1413.4, 1436.2, 1436.3, 1540, and new Tables 14-1A, 14-1B, 14-1C, 14-1D, 14-1E, 14-1F, 14-1J, 14-1K, 14-1L, 14-1M, and new Section 3.6.5 to Reference Standard 29 of the Energy Code; and repealing Tables 14-1, 14-2, and 14-3 of the Energy Code.
